findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations end after two years, which may expose sensitive information if the relationship continues beyond this period.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The definition of Confidential Information is broad, which may lead to misunderstandings about what constitutes confidential data.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including technical data, business strategies...

findings.rationale: The contract states that information must be returned or destroyed upon request, but lacks details on the process, which may lead to non-compliance.
findings.evidence_quote: Return or destroy all Confidential Information upon request
